languages.text: {n}При вашем приближении Абеляр распрямляет спину и болезненно кряхтит, когда в его спине что-то хрустит.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. К вашим услугам".

traits.locale_text: {n}При вашем приближении Абеляр распрямляет спину и болезненно кряхтит, когда в его спине что-то хрустит.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. К вашим услугам".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем приближении Абеляр распрямляет спину и болезненно кряхтит, когда в его спине что-то хрустит.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. К вашим услугам".

traits.locale_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}当你接近时，阿贝拉德直起身子，痛苦低哼了一声。你听到他后背上有什么东西咯吱咯吱地响了几声。{/n}“我时刻听从您的吩咐，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你接近时，阿贝拉德直起身子，痛苦低哼了一声。你听到他后背上有什么东西咯吱咯吱地响了几声。{/n}“我时刻听从您的吩咐，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

languages.text: {n}Al acercarte, Abelard se endereza y gruñe de dolor cuando algo cruje en su espalda.{/n} «Lord Capitán, es un honor servirle».
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al acercarte, Abelard se endereza y gruñe de dolor cuando algo cruje en su espalda.{/n} «Lord Capitán, es un honor servirle».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが近づくと、アベラルドは背筋を伸ばす。同時に、背中のなにかが砕けるような痛みにうめいた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、お望みのままに」
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近づくと、アベラルドは背筋を伸ばす。同時に、背中のなにかが砕けるような痛みにうめいた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、お望みのままに」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, richtet Abelard sich auf und grunzt vor Schmerzen, als in seinem Rücken etwas hörbar knackt.{/n} "Lord Captain. Ich diene Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, richtet Abelard sich auf und grunzt vor Schmerzen, als in seinem Rücken etwas hörbar knackt.{/n} "Lord Captain. Ich diene Euch."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous vous approchez d'Abélard, il se redresse et pousse un grognement de douleur en sentant quelque chose craquer dans son dos.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis à votre service. »
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous vous approchez d'Abélard, il se redresse et pousse un grognement de douleur en sentant quelque chose craquer dans son dos.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis à votre service. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yaklaştığını gören Abelard, belinden çatırtılar gelirken bir yandan da çektiği ağrılara söyleniyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. Emrinize amadeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, Abelard straightens and grunts in pain as something in his back crunches.{/n} "Lord Captain. I serve at your pleasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaklaştığını gören Abelard, dikilirken çektiği ağrılara söyleniyor ve belinden çatırtılar geliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. Emrinize amadeyim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
